comment._content: jezz! some challenge,  great shot all things considerd

comment.author: 29802266@N07
comment._content: Lieutenant Flashman wins the Military Cross by rushing into the path of an advancing Jerry tank in order to save his cache of looted cognac from certain destruction; overly polite Germans obligingly halt lead tank, throwing entire armoured formation into confusion, thereby sapping their attack of all momentum and granting British Army precious time in which to rally to counterattack.

comment.author: 26022992@N07
comment._content:
Col. Bluett:  Listen, you Huns over there.  If you don't surrender forthwith, I shall have no option but to order my driver to crush your puny trench on the count of three.  One... two...

Sgt. Miller (on left): Sir, perhaps you should take two steps to the rear.  Sir?
